thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: JOHN from Pittsburgh
thread.title_full: OptiContacts.com reviewed by JOHN from Pittsburgh

author: JOHN from Pittsburgh
title: JOHN from Pittsburgh
text:
My first order came within a week and was correct. My only suggestion would be to put the cost of the "processing fee" into the lens price. $26 seems very high, especially when you don't see it till you populate all the information for the order.
The cost was still substantially less than ordering from my doctor, but saying the lenses were $21/ box instead of $15/box plus the "processing fee" would be more palatable, in my opinion. The other way feels like an extra cost was sneaked in after the fact....
